name: Aakash Rajpurohit
title: Full-stack Developer
aboutText: I'm a full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience in web development and mobile app development. I specialize in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and modern web technologies.
passionText: I enjoy working on complex problems and creating user-friendly solutions. My passion is to combine technology and design to create meaningful experiences that users love to interact with.
